languages.text: {n}Кибелла прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Да. Это... новое ощущение. Каждое мгновение с тобой было исполнено смыслом. Пустое вожделение не дало бы такой глубины чувств".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла прикрывает глаза и сладко произносит:{/n} "Да. Каждое мгновение с тобой было исполнено смыслом, ведь ты {mf|мой|моя} Домин, и наша связь прочна. Пустое вожделение не дало бы такой глубины чувств".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah's eyes drift closed.{/n} "Yes. It was... a new sensation. Every moment with you was replete with meaning. Empty lust would not grant such depth of feeling."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah cierra lentamente los ojos.{/n} «Sí. Ha sido... una nueva sensación. Cada segundo entre sus brazos ha significado mucho. Las palabras vacías de la lujuria son incapaces de evocar un sentimiento tan profundo».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes drift closed.{/n} "Yes. It was... a new sensation. Every moment with you was replete with meaning. Empty lust would not grant such depth of feeling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah cierra lentamente los ojos.{/n} «Sí. Ha sido... una nueva sensación. Cada segundo entre sus brazos ha significado mucho. Las palabras vacías de la lujuria son incapaces de evocar un sentimiento tan profundo».

languages.text: {n}キベラは目を閉じた。{/n}「そう、それは…新しい感覚でした。あなたと過ごした一秒一秒に意味がありました。空虚な欲望では、このような感情の深さは得られません」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes drift closed.{/n} "Yes. It was... a new sensation. Every moment with you was replete with meaning. Empty lust would not grant such depth of feeling."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは目を閉じた。{/n}「そう、それは…新しい感覚でした。あなたと過ごした一秒一秒に意味がありました。空虚な欲望では、このような感情の深さは得られません」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈渐渐闭上了眼睛。{/n}“我很满足，这是……一种全新的感悟，与你在一起的每一刻都充满了意义。若仅仅是空洞的色欲，恐怕无法带来如此深刻的情感。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes drift closed.{/n} "Yes. It was... a new sensation. Every moment with you was replete with meaning. Empty lust would not grant such depth of feeling."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈渐渐闭上了眼睛。{/n}“我很满足，这是……一种全新的感悟，与你在一起的每一刻都充满了意义。若仅仅是空洞的色欲，恐怕无法带来如此深刻的情感。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah schließt die Augen.{/n} "Ja. Es war eine ... neue Empfindung. Jeder Moment war voller Bedeutung. Bloße Lust würde kein so tiefes Gefühl wecken."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes drift closed.{/n} "Yes. It was... a new sensation. Every moment with you was replete with meaning. Empty lust would not grant such depth of feeling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah schließt die Augen.{/n} "Ja. Es war eine ... neue Empfindung. Jeder Moment war voller Bedeutung. Bloße Lust würde kein so tiefes Gefühl wecken."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah ferme lentement les yeux.{/n} « Oui. C'était... une sensation nouvelle. Chaque instant passé avec vous était chargé de sens. La vaine luxure ne saurait enfanter de sentiment aussi profond. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes drift closed.{/n} "Yes. It was... a new sensation. Every moment with you was replete with meaning. Empty lust would not grant such depth of feeling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah ferme lentement les yeux.{/n} « Oui. C'était... une sensation nouvelle. Chaque instant passé avec vous était chargé de sens. La vaine luxure ne saurait enfanter de sentiment aussi profond. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın gözleri yavaşça kapanıyor.{/n} "Evet... Yeni bir... Histi. Seninle geçirdiğim her an, anlam yüklüydü. Boş arzular, böylesine derin hisler bahşetmez."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes drift closed.{/n} "Yes. It was... a new sensation. Every moment with you was replete with meaning. Empty lust would not grant such depth of feeling."
